Summon Commander:#2334 Lemur Thaumaturg
A Lemur Thaumaturg is the spirit of an ancient Scelerian Thaumaturg that has been brought back from the Underworld. The thaumaturgs were the leading mage priests of the empire and the architects of the scelerian death cult.
